r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version and CLI output script
r.n:
Consider this version as a high bug fix release. Especially if you want to parse files/dirs with conditional code such as function_exists(), extension_loaded(), and defined().
* bugs - #13873: Undefined Offset Error for function_exists detection
* news - support of error_reporting constant E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR introduced with PHP 5.2.0 - show a progress bar when parsing directories from CLI
